about_the_game:
Lucky Hand is a roguelike deckbuilding game where every card drawn shapes your fate. Build powerful decks, strategize against challenging enemies, and explore dangerous places. With each battle, unlock new cards to help you in your adventure!

About Lucky Hand

Lucky Hand is a roguelike deckbuilding game where strategy and quick thinking are key to surviving dangerous, procedurally generated forests. Build your deck by unlocking powerful cards with each victory and choose from unique heroes, each bringing their own skills and abilities to the fight. Every run presents new challenges and enemies, making each adventure unique and thrilling.

Key Features

As you battle through perilous environments, you'll collect upgrades and refine your deck, enhancing your heroes and unlocking more strategic options. Whether you're a seasoned strategist or new to deckbuilders, Lucky Hand offers endless replayability and tactical depth, with each battle bringing you closer to mastering the art of deckbuilding.
